product_name: The North Face Multi Half Dome Crew T-Shirt - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With soft fabric, bright colors and a perfect fit, The North Face Multi Half-Dome Crew girls' T-Shirt is anything but basic. Lightweight, breathable cotton is easy to care for. Closeout.
